name: What You Can
description:
In What You Can you'll accept the humble contributions from people from all walks of life and experience how even a little bit adds up to build truly magnificent things. None of us can build great things alone, nor should we - but contributing a little of what we can, when we can - great things are bound to follow.

What You Can celebrates cultural heritage of Ukraine, drawing inspiration from treasures such as St. Michael's Golden-Domed Monastery, Great Lavra Bell Tower, St Sophia's Cathedral, as well as wonderful rural architecture seen in Pyrohovo Open-Air Museum and Pirogovo Village Skansen, and even traditional Slavic deities.

How to play?
Press "Escape" to open up pause menu showing you tips how to play ; P RMB to move around, LMB to interact, MMB to rotate the view. Click on people to accept their gifts, and use those funds to build infrastructure and encourage further contributions.

Team:
Jan "Jonu" Stempkowski - code, UI
Patryk "sDark" Ćwirko - code,
Michał Ślusarski - 3D art,
Martyna "Lisza" Wasiluk - game design, UI, many more hats

Assets used (not made by the team):
- all SFX & music
- visual effect for building placement used as a base an asset from the Asset Store, and as mesh - another asset
- font Fredoka One, under open SIL Open Font License
